snippet.title: Race Drivin' [Saturn] by Atari Games - Super Stunt Track [HD] [1080p]
snippet.description:
Race Drivin' (レースドライビン) is an arcade racer by Atari Games that later received a Japanese-exclusive port to the Saturn in 1995.

If you've ever owned a Sega Genesis, you might be familiar with this game's predecessor, Hard Drivin'. While Hard Drivin' isn't exactly a good racer, its fully 3D track rendered on 16-bit hardware was and still is sort of impressive. By the time its sequel Race Drivin' was ported to the Saturn in 1995 though, it was already a five-year-old game. With its dated flat-shaded polygons and incredibly choppy framerate, it could hardly compete against the likes of slick new 3D racers such as Namco's Ridge Racer or Sega's own Daytona USA. Needless to say, it's abundantly clear why this game stayed in Japan.

Check out my other Race Drivin' videos below:

Super Stunt Track - http://youtu.be/1WRaY57D0BY
Original Track - http://youtu.be/XDWg3pdGwUQ
Auto Cross - http://youtu.be/ZMmxxF-zxqE

Enjoy the video? Remember to like, comment, and subscribe!
Twitter: @SaturnMemories

Race Drivin' (レースドライビン, 레이스 드라이빙, 賽車駕駛) | T-4802G | Atari Games (アタリゲームズ, 아타리 게임즈, 雅達利) | Time Warner Interactive (タイムワーナー・インターラクティブ, 타임워너인터액티브) | Sega Saturn (セガサターン, 세가 새턴, 世嘉土星) | [SS] | Arcade Game (アーケードゲーム, 아케이드 게임, 街机游戏) | Simulation Game (シミュレーションゲーム, 시뮬레이션 게임, 模擬遊戲) | Racing Game, Racer (レースゲーム, 레이싱 게임, 竞速遊戲) | Racing Simulator (レーシングシミュレータ, 시뮬레이션 레이싱 게임, 赛车模拟) | Driving Simulator (ドライビングシミュレータ, 운전 시뮬레이션) | Hard Drivin' (ハードドライビン, 하드 드라이빙, 特技飛車) | 1st Place, First Place | Gameplay | Walkthrough, Guide | Emulator (エミュレータ, 에뮬레이터, 游戏机模拟器) | SSF | High-definition (高精細, 고선명, 高解析) | HD | 1080p
